content: I'm excited to try out the Kundalini yoga classes at Yoga House Bali. Since I've been practicing yoga consistently for the past 3 months, I'm confident that I'll be able to adapt to the Kundalini style. By the way, I'm feeling motivated to plan this retreat because I just got back into my yoga routine after a 2-week break, and the week before that, I met my goal of attending classes.
